original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND v.BountyAmount>=0 AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes<=57 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-26 09:01:31' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-10 11:01:39' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount >= 0 AND votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes <= 57 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-26 09:01:31' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-10 11:01:39')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E4.UserId=E3.UserId)
